```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, include = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```

```{r packages}
library(compareRhythms)
library(genefilter)
library(SummarizedExperiment)
```

## Revealing example using liver data

```{r load-hughes-data}
liver_hughes <- readRDS("data/GSE11923.RDS")

f1 <- kOverA(48, 4)
sel <- genefilter(assay(liver_hughes), f1)

liver_hughes <- liver_hughes[sel, ]

exp_design <- as.data.frame(colData(liver_hughes))
exp_design$group <- ifelse(exp_design$time %% 2, "O", "E")
```

```{r analyze-odd-even}

results_MC <- compareRhythms_model_select(assay(liver_hughes), exp_design)

results_rain <- compareRhythms_rain(assay(liver_hughes), exp_design)

results_limma <- compareRhythms_limma(assay(liver_hughes), exp_design)


```
